channel.title: [PI] Can some one help me? [PI]
channel.description: Can some one help me make a Reward system. i want it to be like the pk one but different. i want it to be where u lvl up u get 10 pts u kill a npc thats 5 you kill a boss thats 15 pts and so on. how could i do this? im confused on it :/
